name: World War III
description: This refers to an all-out-war situation.

name: Counter-Insurgency Operations
description: This refers to a medium-intensity conflict against non-state actors de-stabilizing a friendly government.

name: Operations within a SNMG 1
description: This refers to scenarios when operating as part of a Standard NATO Maritime Group 1

name: Single Ship Operations
description: This refers to scenarios when operating as a single ship

name: High Clutter Environment
description: When operating in littoral areas, or where there is high volume of friendly and/or white assets
